main event: A witness reported observing a silvery object that appeared to come out of a cloud and remained stationary in the air for about five minutes before ascending rapidly.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a satellite but was later concluded to be something else., The sighting lasted for approximately five minutes., The witness described the object as silvery and noted its unusual behavior of moving straight up and down., The report was made to Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force initiative to investigate UFO sightings., The witness's contact details were redacted in the report.
sighted object: a silvery object in the sky
witness description: the witness observed the object visually for several minutes
